creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells

markings: red artist's seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | BRC, publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第百参拾九番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai hyakusanjūkyū ban} (edition of 250, number 139) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper with mica
portfolio: The First Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai isshū 現代美人集第一輯)
title: Hand Mirror
